item.title: Consulting
item.description: Introduction I specialize in (widely understood) AI, machine learning (ML), and data science (DS). I can help you succeed in your research by providing scientific consultations, advisory or creating software. Whether you need a predictive model, statistical analysis, software for research, or to automate specific tasks, I can help. Services I offer the following data science-related services: üñ•Ô∏è Writing programs or projects utilizing data science and machine learning: I can help you create custom software that meets your specific needs.
